name: flyby
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a flight, especially in a spacecraft, past a particular point in space: The pictures were taken during the spacecraft's 25-minute flyby of the asteroid.
US (UK flypast) an occasion when a group of aircraft flies in a special pattern as a part of a ceremony
ph.antonio pulizzi/Moment/GettyImages
